text: Levir Culpi (born 28 February 1953) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Coaching statistics== J.League Data Site Team From To Record G W D L Win % Atletico Mineiro 1994,2001,2006,2014,2018 1995,2001,2007,2015,2019 Cerezo Osaka 1997 1997 Cerezo Osaka 2007 2011 Cerezo Osaka 2012 2013 Santos 2017 2017 Gamba Osaka 2018 2018 Total ==Honours== ===Player=== ;Coritiba *Campeonato Paranaense: 1973 ;Santa Cruz *Campeonato Pernambucano: 1976 ===Manager=== ;Inter de Limeira *Campeonato Brasileiro Série B: 1988 ;Criciúma *Campeonato Catarinense: 1989 ;Paraná *Campeonato Paranaense: 1993 ;Cruzeiro *Copa do Brasil: 1996 *Campeonato Mineiro: 1996, 1998 *Recopa Sudamericana: 1998 *Copa Centro-Oeste: 1999 ;São Paulo *Campeonato Paulista: 2000 ;Atlético Mineiro *Campeonato Mineiro: 1995, 2007, 2015 *Campeonato Brasileiro Série B: 2006 *Recopa Sudamericana: 2014 *Copa do Brasil: 2014 ;Fluminense *Primeira Liga: 2016 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Curitiba Category:Brazilian football managers Category:Cerezo Osaka managers Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras managers
title: Levir Culpi
